二手和第三次烟雾对宠物的影响如果您是吸烟者，您可能会意识到吸烟的危险可能会对您的健康构成构成。但是，您是否曾经考虑过这种习惯如何影响您的宠物？食品和药物管理局兽医Carmela Stamper（DVM）表示，这一消息不好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/secondhand-and-and-thirdhand-smokes-smokes-effect-on-pets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/secondhand-and-and-thirdhand-smokes-smokes-effect-on-pets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7946dd3-b7ee-458D-895E-AD89C5091F3F Fri, 28 Feb 2025 14:07:00 -0500 Secondhand and thirdhand smoke's effect on pets
创新的创业公司获得10,000美元来解决心血管差异心血管疾病不成比例地影响黑人社区，超过57％的非西班牙裔黑人患有某种形式的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/innovative-startup-receives-2410000-to-address-cardiress-cardiescular-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/innovative-startup-receives-2410000-to-address-cardress-cardiescular-disparistories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b62502a-d62b-4171-af1717-d3ae0baa0e9a Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:54:00 -0500 Innovative startup receives $10,000 to address cardiovascular disparities
NIH决定间接成本的决定引发了科学界的关注2025年2月7日，美国国立卫生研究院宣布决定间接偿还成本 - 支持关键的基础设施和使生物医学研究可能达到15％的员工。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/nih-decision-to-cap-cap-indirect-costs-costs-sparks-concerns-concern-incientific-community.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/nih-decision-to-cap-cap-indirect-costs-costs-sparks-concerns-concern-concern-scientific-community.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c83f381-6949-437b-b372-d06ab87b87b6cf1 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:46:00 -0500 NIH decision to cap indirect costs sparks concern in scientific community

了解宠物的肥胖症及其健康风险您8岁的巧克力实验室正在体重增加，您知道她可能应该减掉一两磅。但是，当她用那些棕色的大眼睛挑剔地看着你时，您如何才能抗拒再分发一种享受呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/understanding-obesity-in-pets-and-pets-and-its-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/understanding-obesity-in-pets-and-pets-and-its-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a0f43ff-ac41-42e6-8f5e-efbc500E9937 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:30:00 -0500 Understanding obesity in pets and its health risks
了解高压氧疗法的益处和风险高压氧疗法以受到周围压力快速变化影响的水肺和深海潜水员的治疗而闻名。但是您是否知道HBOT也用于治疗其他各种健康问题，包括一氧化碳中毒和糖尿病足溃疡？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/dunderstanding-the-benefits-and-benefits-and-risks-of-hyperbaric-oxygen-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/understanding-the-benefits-and-benefits-and-risks-of-hyperbaric-oxygen-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a96ecf-15D8-4F75-9556-501AFT9F24A1 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:22:00 -0500 Understanding the benefits and risks of hyperbaric oxygen therapy

研究表明枫糖浆尿液疾病的成功基因治疗UMass Chan研究人员领导的一项研究表明，一种基因疗法纠正导致枫糖浆尿液疾病（MSUD）的突变，可以防止新生儿死亡，归一化的生长，恢复受影响基因的协调表达并稳定小牛和小鼠的生物标记物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-dymstrates-successful-gene-therapy-for-maple-maple-syrup-urine-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-dymstrates-successful-gene-therapy-for-maple-maple-syrup-urine-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0693fe05-9c14-4cbe-b3c1-fa8a36186fd6 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:12:00 -0500 Study demonstrates successful gene therapy for maple syrup urine disease
